item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. We're bringing Pebble back (1137 points | 291 comments)
2. The Impact of 25% Tariffs on Canadian GDP (13 points | 3 comments)
3. Google open-sources the Pebble OS (649 points | 109 comments)
4. The Taylorator – All Your Frequencies Are Belong to Us (223 points | 65 comments)
5. Slack Overflow (21 points | 6 comments)
6. Go 1.24's go tool is one of the best additions to the ecosystem in years (124 points | 44 comments)
7. Using AI for Coding: My Journey with Cline and Large Language Models (89 points | 31 comments)
8. Facebook ban on discussing Linux? (418 points | 187 comments)
9. DeepSeek releases Janus Pro, a text-to-image generator [pdf] (583 points | 454 comments)
10. The ocean teems with networks of interconnected bacteria (77 points | 15 comments)
11. Dragonsweeper — A minesweeper game that requires observation (36 points | 19 comments)
12. The Alpha Myth: How captive wolves led us astray (145 points | 88 comments)
13. My failed attempt to shrink all NPM packages by 5% (285 points | 189 comments)
14. Oliver Heaviside and the theory of transmission lines (2021) (220 points | 65 comments)
15. Show HN: I Made an iOS Podcast Player with Racket (171 points | 58 comments)
16. Bilinear down/upsampling, aligning pixel grids, and that infamous GPU half pixel (2021) (99 points | 14 comments)
17. Operation Leg – a pilot unlike any other (2020) (160 points | 71 comments)
18. A Faster Quantum Fourier Transform (45 points | 1 comment)
19. The Curious Case of Quentell (68 points | 5 comments)
20. I trusted an LLM, now I'm on day 4 of an afternoon project (151 points | 106 comments)
21. Show HN: I Created ErisForge, a Python Library for Abliteration of LLMs (96 points | 42 comments)
22. Highlighting Parts of Lua as Bash (4 points | discuss)
23. SiFive's P550 Microarchitecture (136 points | 48 comments)
24. Peanut Butter Day: Going Nuts over NIST's Standard Reference Peanut Butter (2016) (89 points | 50 comments)
25. A layoff fundamentally changed how I perceive work (871 points | 810 comments)
26. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (582 points | 411 comments)
27. Openhaystack: Build 'AirTags' – track Bluetooth devices via Apple's network (420 points | 105 comments)
28. The future of Rebble (342 points | 19 comments)
29. Non-random uniform disk sampling (43 points | 24 comments)
30. Lessons in creating family photos that people want to keep (2018) (365 points | 145 comments)
